description: Melissa Mao is serving as the SRT`s second-in-command next to Gail McAllen, she serves in Mithril under the call sign Uruz-2. An expert in engineering, she assisted in the development of the M9 and is also an expert in electronic warfare and AS. Independent and incorrigible. Believes in a woman`s flexibility and cooperation, and takes care of things in a sisterly manner. Passed through Uruz 6 and was promoted to Number Two in SRT as Uruz 2. In the three-man team format of SRT, she often works with Sousuke and Kurz, and is their reliable "big-sister" figure.
name: Melissa Mao
